EmailTemplate.name: ENG-QoS-Nurture.ENG-QOS-Early-01.01-n-Dimension-e-Book
EmailTemplate.subject: Can You Solve The Modern Datacenter's Greatest Challenge?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/VMTurbo_The-Desired-State-eBook.pdf?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-QOS&utm_content=Early01]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your data center is more complex than you give it credit for. With a multitude of resources (CPU, RAM, IOPs, NetIO, Balloon, Swap, Buffer, Flow...) whose utilization can assume a multitude of states affecting performance, how do you find a state that satisfies all of the inherent tradeoffs? What about when we add hybrid cloud, containers or webscale application architectures?All of these tradeoffs combine to create an n-dimensional problem beyond human scale. Click below to see if you can solve this problem <[[http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/VMTurbo_The-Desired-State-eBook.pdf?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-QOS&utm_content=Early01]]> -The VMTurbo Team
